channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PayPal Betting Sites 2026: Top Sportsbooks that Accept PayPal
item.description: We review the best sports betting websites that take PayPal, including – bet365 (our #1 pick), DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, and more.

item.title: Joaquin Niemann Wins MVP, Bryson DeChambeau Gets Drive of the Year at LIV Golf Showcase
item.description: Here were the awards passed out during the inaugural LIV Golf Showcase on Thursday.

item.title: Google Confirms All Indiana HC Curt Cignetti Does Is Win: 'Yup, He Won'
item.description: There's now a special message that displays when you search Curt Cignetti's name on Google.

item.title: ParlayPlay Promo Code: Get a $100 Deposit Match Bonus with Code FOXSPORTS
item.description: Use the ParlayPlay promo code to get a 100% deposit match up to $100. Split your bonus into promo entries and start building pick’em cards today.

item.title: Underdog Promo Code FOXSPORTS: Play $5 Get $75 in Bonus Entries
item.description: Claim the Underdog Fantasy promo code and unlock $75 in bonus cash when you play just $5. Learn how to claim, terms, app features, and more.

item.title: What NBA greats Kerr, Nash & Co. learned owning LaLiga's Mallorca
item.description: What has it taught a collection of stars about sport, leadership and life?

item.title: Predictions for rest of MLB offseason: Where will the best ace available sign? Who will make a major trade?
item.description: How will the rest of free agency play out? Here's what our experts think could go down between now and spring training.

item.title: Premier League Power Rankings: Rating all 20 teams on performances, not results
item.description: In the debut of ESPN's Premier League Power Rankings: a look at all 20 teams, including why Liverpool, Chelsea and Tottenham are better than the table...

item.title: The Hall of Fame has a starting pitcher problem. Here's what it means for today's aces
item.description: After no pitchers got the call to Cooperstown -- again -- this week, what does the future hold?

item.title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus each team's top celebrity fan
item.description: The Canes move into the Top 3, while the Penguins and Mammoth rise too. Which team was the biggest faller?
